tool_description: Cryptocurrency API to get data such as live crypto prices, market cap, volume, and more.
name: Pro Crypto API
title: Pro Crypto API

api_list.name: prices
api_list.description: Find prices for a given cryptocurrency by ID

required_parameters.name: coin_id
required_parameters.description:
ID of cryptocurrency.
Get ID from /search or /list

optional_parameters.name: interval
optional_parameters.description:
Interval to check for
Options: 1d, 7d, 1mo, 3mo, 1y, ytd, max
Default: 7d

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description:
End date for prices.
If to is set, interval is ignored.

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description:
Earliest date for prices.
If from is set, interval is ignored.

api_list.name: list
api_list.description: Paginated list of available cryptocurrencies and their IDs

api_list.name: search
api_list.description: Search for cryptocurrency and its ID
